abstract: Whether by osmosis or because of romantic involvement, our intrepid reporter discovers the joys and disappointments of supporting a specific club -- Juventus.
snippet: Whether by osmosis or because of romantic involvement, our intrepid reporter discovers the joys and disappointments of supporting a specific club -- Juventus.
lead_paragraph: CHAPEL HILL, N.C. -- I woke up to my alarm, put on my Juventus jersey, and headed downstairs to the living room Sunday morning. It wasn't a major championship, no one I knew personally was playing, but as I turned on Fox Soccer, I felt nervous in anticipation of the outcome.

headline.main: No Longer Merely a Fair-Weather Fan
